alert.note: Alert for Cooper; Saline (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 21 at 9:04PM CDT until March 25 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Big Creek at Blairstown affecting Johnson MO, Cass and Henry Counties. Blackwater River near Blue Lick affecting Saline and Cooper Counties. Chariton River near Prairie Hill affecting Chariton and Macon Counties. Grand River near Sumner affecting Linn MO, Chariton, Livingston and Carroll Counties. For the Big Creek...including Blairstown...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Blackwater River...including Blue Lick...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Chariton River...including Prairie Hill...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Grand River...including Sumner...Moderate flooding is forecast. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT TO LATE FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Blackwater River near Blue Lick. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night to late Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Cropland and pastures along the river flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CDT Monday the stage was 9.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday morning to a crest of 25.2 feet early Thursday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
